title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows work stations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: There is no UI option available in the preferences to define the default line delimiters for new files.
EB: A UI option should be added to the preferences to allow users to define the default line delimiters for new files.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Open the Eclipse IDE on a Windows workstation.
2. Go to the preferences menu.
3. Navigate to the section related to file settings.
4. Observe that there is no option available to define the default line delimiters for new files.
